title: bubutales
description:
Hey! 
I'm Mykhailo. Made this website for my daughter and want to share with all parents too.

We have 2 perks now: 

1. Find tales for your kid, based on: 
- cartoons 
- movies 
- anime 
- games 
Interesting for parents also!

2. Get a tale voiced with YOUR voice! Get a DEMO!

And more small features:

⏱️ Two Versions: 2min, 5min 
🌍 Two Languages: Ukrainian and English and Turkish
🎧 Voiceover: Added voiceovers 

To get access to 20+  tales for FREE - just log in.
